divs: Sighting Detailsalong the tracks in langehorn i mountainbike ride continuosly thruout the y abreak along the tracksear i told coworkers about this when it happend but gave up on anyone taking me seriously this is not bs iwill probably never know what it was but this is what happend as iwas catching cameabreak along thetracks and from o wind b motion as if water waslew in bending trees in acircular t his device gave off no heat and masked its sound with the sound of a very old train iwas amazed and as my brain tried to figure out what was going on it took off down the track where there wasnone it had been tornup yearsago towards yardley pa the device was completely invisible but icould watch it move because off the downdraft it created there was aslight hissing noise that dint jive with the train sound my experience was awesome what the heck was it
